## fetchRastertilesets

## fetchUsersList

## fetchAuthUser

This is action FETCH AUTH USER

## fetchPointClouds

This will fetch all available pointclouds as a feature collection from the server.<br>
Called once on init.

Returns **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** action - type 'POINTCLOUD_FETCH'

## updateWorldState

This will fill store.world with current map location
and update in bounds objects (rasterlayers, pointclouds, etc).<br>
It is called each time map is moved by user

**Parameters**

-   `params` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** current map params, as provided by mapbox
    -   `params.lng` **[number](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)** longitude
    -   `params.lat` **[number](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)** latitude
    -   `params.zoom` **[number](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)** zoom
    -   `params.bounds` **[Array](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array)** bounds

## createUser

**Parameters**

-   `form`  

## login

This is action LOGIN

**Parameters**

-   `form`  

## resetCreateState

## initSelectedPointCloud

This will toggle pointcloud selection on init.<br>

**Parameters**

-   `params` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 
    -   `params.pointCloudId` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** the id of the initially selected pointcloud

Returns **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** action - type 'POINTCLOUD_INIT_SELECTED'

## resetLoginState

This is action RESET LOGIN STATE

## clickMedias

This will toggle media selection/deselection.<br>
It is called each time a user clicks on the map
and each time they click on a media in the Carousel component.

**Parameters**

-   `params` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 
    -   `params.features` **[Array](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array)** array of media features that were clicked (can be empty)
    -   `params.ctrlKey` **[boolean](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean)** whether user was pressing ctrl key when they clicked
    -   `params.isAdmin` **[boolean](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean)** whether user has admin rights

## fetchUser

**Parameters**

-   `userId`  

## register

**Parameters**

-   `form`  

## updateUser

**Parameters**

-   `form`  
-   `userId`  

## resetRegisterState

## clickPointCloud

This will toggle pointcloud selection/deselection.<br>

**Parameters**

-   `params` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 
    -   `params.features` **[Array](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array)** the clicked mapbox features,
        either pointcloud features (feature.layer.id='pointClouds-layer'),
        either media features (feature.layer.id='medias-layer').<br>
        In case no pointcloud feature is clicked, check if any of the clicked media
        has an associated pointcloud and select it

Returns **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** action - type 'POINTCLOUD_SELECT_BY_ID'

## resetUpdateState

## logout

## deleteUsers

**Parameters**

-   `userIds`  

## forgotPassword

**Parameters**

-   `form`  

## selectMediaById

This will toggle media selection/deselection.<br>
Used instead of clickMedias when only the media id is known.

**Parameters**

-   `params` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 
    -   `params.mediaId` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** the id of the media to select
    -   `params.ctrlKey` **[boolean](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean)** whether user was pressing ctrl key when they clicked
    -   `params.isAdmin` **[boolean](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean)** whether user has admin rights

## switchPreviewMode

This will toggle store.previewMode (when previewMode=true, map fills the small part of the screen).<br>
It is called each time user clicks on PreviewSwitch component.

## resetForgotPasswordState

## resetPassword

**Parameters**

-   `form`  
-   `token`  

## resetDeleteState

## toggleLayer

This will toggle a layer's visibility.<br>

**Parameters**

-   `params` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 
    -   `params.layerId` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** id of the layer to toggle

## resetResetPasswordState

## selectPointCloudById

This will toggle pointcloud selection/deselection.<br>
Used instead of clickPointcloud when only the pointcloud id is known.
(different from initSelectedPointCloud)

**Parameters**

-   `params` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 
    -   `params.pointCloudId` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** the id of the pointCloud to select (can be undefined)

Returns **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** action - type 'POINTCLOUD_SELECT_BY_ID'

## startDragMapMedias

This will toggle media selection/deselection.<br>
Used instead of clickMedias when only the media id is known.

**Parameters**

-   `params` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 
    -   `params.isAdmin` **[boolean](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean)** whether user has admin rights
    -   `params.mediaId` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** the id of the media to select
    -   `params.ctrlKey` **[boolean](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean)** whether user was pressing ctrl key when they clicked
    -   `params.features`  

## togglePointCloud

This will toggle pointcloud visibility.<br>

**Parameters**

-   `params` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 
    -   `params.pointClouId` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** the id of the pointCloud to show/hide
    -   `params.pointCloudId`  

Returns **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** action - type 'POINTCLOUD_TOGGLE'

## dragMapMedias

**Parameters**

-   `$0` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 
    -   `$0.lat`  
    -   `$0.lng`  
    -   `$0.isAdmin`  

## endDragMapMedias

**Parameters**

-   `$0` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 
    -   `$0.lat`  
    -   `$0.lng`  
    -   `$0.feature`  
    -   `$0.isAdmin`
